issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
We need to update the SDK being used in the iOS module. Currently it is V104.02 Date:05.01.2012.

It must be updated to at least V122.01.
fields.summary: ti.magtek: Update module to use latest MagTek SDK

comments.body:
* Moved module from archive to appcelerator-modules to signalize we still supporting it
* Updated the Magtek SDK to v122.01 (latest)
* Linted the whole source to match our common code-style
* Refactored some general code- and casting-issues
* Bumped the minimum SDK version from 2.1.3 to 5.5.0
* Bumped the module version from 2.1.0 to 3.0.0

New version on Github: [ti.magtek-iphone-3.0.0.zip|https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.magtek/releases/tag/v3.0.0]
Cleaning up older fixed issues. If this issue should not have been closed as fixed, please reopen.
